label: sizeCode
comment: The code specifying the size of this logistics label.

domainIncludes.comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
A label, such as a garment label or a radio frequency tag, used for identifying a product.
A label used for identifying goods for logistics purposes, such as a barcode, a radio frequency tag or a Vehicle Identification Number (VIN).
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
A label, such as a garment label or a radio frequency tag, used for identifying a product.
